description:
Taishi is the person responsible for the deaths of Ranmaru`s parents in the Machida massacre. He was one of the alchemists who opened the gate of the phantoms. Like the members of the 2nd Division (Tokko), he is a symbiote but is highly evolved with mysterious powers.
He appears for the first time in the show as an anonymous voice on the phone in episode 7.
name: Taishi
